name: Swedish Anus: The Race
description:
Press keys W,  A, S and D to move (or arrow keys). SPACE to jump and mouse to look. To switch to full screen, press the blue square on the bottom right.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Growing up in a communistic and very catholic country for a boy with an interest for the same sex was difficult.  After immigrating to modern Sweden, I had my first experience with a Swedish boy. I dedicate this game to Arvid from Sweden.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a multiplayer game. Up to 20 people in one place. You can chat (TAB to show and hide).

How to play:

1. Find the way to the anus but be careful not to get shot. It will send you back to the start.

2. Once you enter the anus, you will receive a "tentacle" and be sent to the sky platform. You are safe there as no one can shoot. You can press TAB to show/hide chat. To type press ENTER and then ENTER again to send.

3. Once you jump down, you can shoot others and collect points to become the best!

4. Shooting colorful billboards will exit the game and open a sponsor's website.

Enjoy and if you like it, comment so I can make more art games like this one.
